availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James A Steele (Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee, deputy marshal)

body.p: Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee, deputy marshal. Tennessee native. Served as deputy marshal in Nashville from 1862 to 1865.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Nashville, Davidson County, p. 393. "The Nashville Union, 1862-06-26," The Ancestor Hunt, Tennessee Online Historical Newspapers Summary, https://chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83025718/1862-06-26/ed-1/ (accessed April 2, 2019). "The Nashville Union, 1865-01-27," The Ancestor Hunt, Tennessee Online Historical Newspapers Summary, https://chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83025718/1865-01-27/ed-1/seq-4/ (accessed April 2, 2019).
